mapper.select: select r.id, r.task_id, t.name as task_name, p.id as project_id, p.name as project_name, r.auditor_id, r.status, r.comments, r.created_at, r.reviewed_at from reviews r join tasks t on r.task_id = t.id join projects p on t.project_id = p.id join teachers te on p.teacher_id = te.id join accounts a on te.account_id = a.id where a.id = #{id}
